categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Barrage" was the nickname of a clone commando serving in the Grand Army of the Republic during the Clone Wars. He wore unique black armor similar to Advanced Recon Force trooper armor with spikes protruding from the shoulders, knees, elbows, and helmet. He was on a Mission to Iceberg Three, along with a Jedi General, Plo Koon, and CC-3636.
Barrage first appeared as a purchasable outfit on the online game Clone Wars Adventures for 100,000 Republic Credits. He later appeared as an NPC standing on Iceberg Three.
